body_html: @tfboyd: I would be grateful for descriptions on doing CUDA 9.0RC+cuDNN 7.0. I am using a weird system myself (ubuntu 17.10 beta with TF1.3, CUDA 8.0 and cuDNN 6.0 gcc-4.8), and upgrading to cuda 9 and cudnn 7 would actually be nice compilerwise.
